var.name: carea_max
var.description: Maximum contributing area Maximum possible area contributing to surface runoff expressed as a portion of the HRU area

var.name: cov_type
var.description: Vegetation cover type designation for HRU (0=bare soil; 1=grasses; 2=shrubs; 3=trees

var.name: covden_sum
var.description: Summer vegetation cover density for the major vegetation type on each HRU. [intcp]

var.name: covden_win
var.description: Winter vegetation cover density for the major vegetation type on each HRU

var.name: dprst_pct_open
var.description: Decimal fraction of depression storage area that can flow to a stream channel. Amount of flow is a function of storage.

var.name: frozen
var.description: Flag for frozen ground (0=no; 1=yes).

var.name: groundmelt
var.description: Amount of snowpack-water that melts each day to soils

var.name: hru_area
var.description: Amount of snowpack-water that melts each day to soils

var.name: hru_deplcrv
var.description: Index number for the snowpack areal depletion curve associated with an HRU

var.name: hru_elev
var.description: Mean elevation for each HRU

var.name: hru_deplcrv
var.description: Index of groundwater reservoir assigned to HRU Index of groundwater reservoir receiving excess soil water from each HRU

var.name: hru_percent_dprst
var.description: HRU depression storage area as a decimal percent of the total HRU area

var.name: hru_percent_imperv
var.description: Proportion of each HRU area that is impervious

var.name: hru_psta
var.description: Index of the base precipitation station used for lapse rate calculations for each HRU

var.name: hru_radpl
var.description: Index of the radiation plane used to compute solar radiation for a given HRU

var.name: hru_solsta
var.description: Index of solar radiation station associated with each HRU

var.name: hru_ssres
var.description: Index of subsurface reservoir receiving excess water from HRU soil zone

var.name: hru_tsta
var.description: Index of the base temperature station used for lapse rate calculations

var.name: hru_type
var.description: HRU maximum impervious area retention storage Maximum impervious area retention storage for each HRU

var.name: imperv_stor_max
var.description: HRU maximum impervious area retention storage Maximum impervious area retention storage for each HRU

var.name: jh_coef_hru
var.description: Jensen-Haise Air temperature coefficient used in Jensen-Haise potential evapotranspiration " + "computations for each HRU. See PRMS manual for calculation method

var.name: pkwater_equiv
var.description: Snowpack water equivalent on an HRU. [snow]

var.name: rad_trncf
var.description: inputParameter rad_trncf

var.name: smidx_coef
var.description: Coefficient in contributing area computations Coefficient in non-linear contributing area algorithm. Equation used is: contributing area = smidx_coef * 10.**(smidx_exp*smidx) where smidx is soil_moist + .5 * ppt_net")Unit("decimal fraction)

var.name: smidx_exp
var.description: Exponent in contributing area computations Exponent in non-linear contributing area algorithm. Equation used is: contributing area = smidx_coef * 10.**(smidx_exp*smidx) where smidx is soil_moist + .5 * ppt_net

var.name: snarea_thresh
var.description: If maximum temperature of an HRU is less than or equal to this value, precipitation is assumed to be snow

var.name: snow_intcp
var.description: Snow interception storage capacity for the major vegetation type in each HRU

var.name: snowinfil_max
var.description: Maximum snow infiltration per day Maximum snow infiltration per day

var.name: soil2gw_max
var.description: Maximum snow infiltration per day Maximum snow infiltration per day

var.name: soil_moist_init
var.description: Initial value of available water in soil profile

var.name: soil_moist_max
var.description: Maximum available water holding capacity of soil profile. Soil profile is surface to bottom of rooting zone

var.name: soil_rechr_init
var.description: Initial value for soil recharge zone (upper part of soil_moist). Must be less than or equal to soil_moist_init

var.name: soil_rechr_max
var.description: Maximum value for soil recharge zone (upper portion of soil_moist where losses occur as both evaporation and transpiration

var.name: soil_type
var.description: HRU soil type (1=sand; 2=loam; 3=clay)

var.name: srain_intcp
var.description: Winter rain interception storage capacity for the major vegetation type in the HRU

var.name: tmax_adj
var.description: Adjustment to maximum temperature for each HRU, estimated based on slope and aspect

var.name: tmin_adj
var.description: Adjustment to minimum temperature for each HRU, estimated based on slope and aspect

var.name: transp_beg
var.description: Month to begin summing tmaxf for each HRU; when sum is >= to transp_tmax, transpiration begins

var.name: transp_end
var.description: Month to stop transpiration computations; transpiration is computed thru end of previous month

var.name: transp_tmax
var.description: Temperature index to determine the specific date of the start of the transpiration)

var.name: wrain_intcp
var.description: Winter rain interception storage capacity for the major vegetation type in the HRU

var.name: nhru
var.description: Number of HRUs.
